statement.p: The diagram below shows a triangle inscribed in a rectangle. The rectangle has width \displaystyle{8.00} ft and height \displaystyle{3.00} ft. One side of the triangle is a long side of the rectangle. The other triangle sides have lengths \displaystyle{5.00} ft and \displaystyle{5.00} ft.
What is the area of the shaded, inscribed triangle? ft²
What is the area of the rectangle? ft²
What is the area of the unshaded parts of the rectangle? ft²
